Title: Check that a list of available branches/parcel box is returned for the selected city
Steps:
1. Click on the 'Send' (//nav[contains(@class,'app-menu-desktop')]//div[contains(text(),'Send')]) header's menu element 
and click on the 'The nearest branch'  (//div[@class='app-header-menu']//a[contains(@href,'/departments')] OR //div[@plerdy-tracking-id="61156379301"])
2. Click on the 'Select city' (//p[contains(text(),'Select city')])
3. Inpit 'Zaporizhzhia' in the 'Settlement' field (//input[contains(@placeholder,'Settlement')]) 
and/OR select 'city Zaporizhzhia' from the list (//ul/li//div[contains(text(),'Zaporizhzhia')])
Expected result:
1. User is redirected to the https://novaposhta.ua/en/departments with map and of the closes branches 
2. The list of the popular cities are opened
3. The list and  a card with branches of selected city is shown. The first address in the list should conatins info about the city - //ul/li//div//p[contains(text(),'Zaporizhia')]

Title: Calculating the cost of delivery between two cities
Precondition:
Go to https://novaposhta.ua/ (eng version)
* unput datat for the test
Steps:
1. 1. Click on the 'Send' (//nav[contains(@class,'app-menu-desktop')]//div[contains(text(),'Send')]) header's menu element 
and click on the 'The shipping cost'  (//div[@plerdy-tracking-id="11879535101"])
2. Field the all mandatory field in the Calculator form:
* From //input[@aria-label="City of departure"]
* To //input[@aria-label="Delivery city"]
*Type of Service (drop down list):
      * Type of send //label[@for="f_0345784c-652c-4c6a-b634-e3e71e904a80"] > Select division //div[@id="f_0345784c-652c-4c6a-b634-e3e71e904a80_0"]
       * Type of receipt //label[@for="f_79e1ecb7-1545-4796-8bc5-2c0181dc03a5"] > Select division //div[@id="f_79e1ecb7-1545-4796-8bc5-2c0181dc03a5_1"]
* Size and type of parcel (drop down list):
      * Choose size and type //label[@for="f_8ec9043c-dd47-4dcc-b88a-2b3c66a85ad0"] > Select Own Dimensions //div[@id="f_8ec9043c-dd47-4dcc-b88a-2b3c66a85ad0_1"]
       * Filed Actual weight //input[@id='f_ab414eca-2100-41bb-b507-2eacdf67af77']
       * Filed Length //input[@id='f_07d2e8f3-5351-4b65-ad55-1bc7e8a93c3d']
       * Filed Width //input[@id='f_07d2e8f3-5351-4b65-ad55-1bc7e8a93c3d']
       * Filed Height //input[@id='f_dd92009b-1281-42f7-aae2-e0b4729480ac']
* Payment datails  //input[@id='f_550017f7-82dd-4c37-a902-51b041e4ae57']
* Add packaging - disable //div[@role='switch']
3. Click Calculate btn //button[contains(@class,'calculate-button')]
Expected result: 3. The Estimated cost is calculated for the specified parameters in the form

Title: Tracking a parcel by TTN number
Precondition:
Go to https://novaposhta.ua/ (eng version)
There is a valid track number:  '20400012345678'
Steps:
1. Enter the TTN number in the field on the main page. //form[@id="main-page-search"]//input[contains(@placeholder,'parcel number')]
2.Click Track btn (//button//span[text()='Track'])
Expected result:
2. The user is redirected to the page https://novaposhta.ua/en/tracking/{{TTN}}
On the page should be available info about parcel and track number can be found by xpath //div[contains(@class,'items-center')]//span[contains(text(),'6437')]
